definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The volatile substance contained a little of sesquiterpenes and diterpenoids.
sentences.chinese: 同時含有少量倍半萜和二萜類物質。

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 還可喫一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸氣的飲料。

sentences.english: There is a little bit of information of swine hepatitis E virus in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國，有少量關於豬戊型肝炎病毒的信息。

sentences.english: Any purchase of a little potassium permanganate for individual self-use need not be put on archives.
sentences.chinese: 個人自用購買少量高錳酸鉀的，無須備案。

sentences.english: A yellowish-brown nickel iron sulfide that is the principal ore of nickel.
sentences.chinese: 一種黃色礦物，含硫化鎳，是少量鎳的來源。

sentences.english: Adding a small amount of drugs will make better results.
sentences.chinese: 加入少量藥物，效果更佳。

sentences.english: The prospector panned off bits of sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.
sentences.chinese: 探礦者淘選從河牀中挖出的少量含金泥砂和沙礫。

sentences.english: Add sugar and milk to taste.
sentences.chinese: 加入少量的牛奶和糖，味道更佳。

sentences.english: Don't determine the position in accordance with few radar information.
sentences.chinese: 不要由少量雷達數據定出船位。

sentences.english: Virtus Bologna has made numerous contract offers to the Los Angeles Lakers star.
sentences.chinese: 博洛尼亞爲湖人隊的很多球星提供了少量的合同。

sentences.english: Bismuth occurs very rarely in nature.
sentences.chinese: 和那些少量金屬元素一樣，自然界裏鉍生成量很少。

sentences.english: But we usually mean by it the immediate, the nuclear family, with some extension.
sentences.chinese: 但通常都是指直系親屬，核心家庭，少量分支。

sentences.english: For millennia, humans have exchanged metal coins and bits of paper to pay each other.
sentences.chinese: 數千年來，人們用金屬貨幣和少量的紙幣相互交易。

sentences.english: It might be possible to get those same restricted-calorie benefits from part-time dieting, the researchers said.
sentences.chinese: 也許少量多餐也能得到相同的好處吧，研究人員說。

sentences.english: The trick is to add that food into your meals in very small amounts.
sentences.chinese: 小竅門就是往你的飯菜中加進少量的此種食物。

sentences.english: How many buses are there? Nine.

definition: other/the others/else/other than it/in addition to the thing mentioned above
